attributes.action: Prevent Boris Johnson’s resignation honours list from taking effect
attributes.additional_details: Boris Johnson resigned in disgrace.  He should not have even been allowed to have the privilege of an honours list. Furthermore many of the people named on the honours list seem to have done little to deserve an honour. They only appear to have been nominated because they supported Johnson without question and are his ‘friends’. This debases the honours system and has lowered the bar to a ridiculously low level.
attributes.background: I would like Parliament or the Government to block Boris Johnson’s resignation honours list.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions relating to nominations for honours or appointments.

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Reform the Honours System and make it independent of Government: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/632600
